text: From Paris with Love is a 2010 French action thriller movie. The movie is about an operative from the CIA who lives in Paris with his girlfriend. John Travolta plays Charlie Wax. Jonathan Rhys Meyers plays James Reese. The reviews on the movie were mixed. This movie was released on February 5, 2010. title: From Paris with Love
